name: json-dereference-cli-v2
author: Siddharth Yadav
description: Provides a cli interface to the json-schema-ref-parser library

scripts.test: ((node dereference.js -s testdata/correct.schema.json && echo "Success: exit code $?") &&  (node dereference.js -s testdata/error.schema.json || echo "Success: exit code $?")) && echo "Test Passed!"
